p: The highest CFR was observed in Italy, followed by China, Iran, and USA on 12 th March, which changed to Italy, Spain, France, Iran, and China on 23 rd March ( Figure 1). Among European countries, Spain and France also faced an increasing rate of CFR. Although Morocco, Panama, and Iraq showed higher CFR values, there was only a small number of total cases, therefore the results of countries with highest outbreak and total cases of COVID-19 were preferentially reported.
